attributes.action: enact Legislation that vehicles engaged in their legitimate business be exempt from parking tickets issued by CCTV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the course of their legitimate work, a right safeguarded by human
rights legislation, people such as taxi-drivers, mini-cab drivers and
delivery drivers have reason to wait from time to time. A physically
present traffic warden is better able to assess whether the waiting
vehicle is causing an obstruction. If the driver remains in or near the
vehicle and is available to move the vehicle quickly if the situation
changes, they should only be liable to pay tickets isssued physically
rather than remotely by camera.
